Reviews.Content: wife stayed 2 weeks january 2011 time taxi driver hard time looking expect impression reassuring hotel spotlessly clean cutting edge design actually borders ikeaish kinda liked pros front office superb staff check fast singapore standards requests directions assistance fast efficient past austin powers theme comfortable welldesigned despite complaint burnt smell dealt promptly apology upgrade larger excellent location corner bus stop 2 minute walk dhoby ghaut subway station connects singapore chicken restaurant station chicken quiet night quiet dont mind noise travelers cons actually tips mustafa electronics store night impossible grab taxi home arguments people waiting entirely cross farrer park front theres subway station youll save yourselves stress 2 famous chicken restaurants singapore wee nam kee chicken boon tong kee cereal prawns definitely stay hotel definitely value expensive singapore
